ZIMT Token.name: ZIMT token
ZIMT Token.description:
### About

ZIMT token is a JWT token you receive using Hub login endpoint.

Usage format: `ZIMT_TOKEN <Token>`

Example: `headers['Authorization'] = ZIMT_TOKEN eyJpZERhdGEiOnsiY3JlYXRlZEJ5IjoiM...`
